title: Luke Combs On Crying At His Wedding And New Music + Zac Brown On ZBB’s Big Comeback + Fun Fact Friday Face-Off: Amy vs. Lunchbox!
itunes:title: Luke Combs On Crying At His Wedding And New Music + Zac Brown On ZBB’s Big Comeback + Fun Fact Friday Face-Off: Amy vs. Lunchbox!
description:
We talk to Luke Combs as part of the Friday Morning Conversation. He tells us about being back in the recording studio, crying at his wedding and when we can expect his 3rd album to drop and more new music to drop. We also catch up with Zac Brown about the new Zac Brown Band song released today and their new tour. Amy, The Queen of Facts, takes on Lunchbox in today’s Fun Fact Faceoff.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
